decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: PR23-064c (Site Location and Block Plan), PR23-064a, PR23-064a rev 02, Reasonable Exception Statement.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse. 
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the side and rear elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for purposes ancillary to the main dwellinghouse at 57 Streatfield Road, Harrow. HA3 9BP, and shall not be used, let or sublet as a separate self contained unit. 

Reason: To safeguard the character of the area and  protect the residential amenity of the adjoining occupiers.
description: Outbuilding at rear for use as gym / home office / storage
